src: [start] ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? LC : Um hello , okay , I think we need to find the rheumatology ward . [MASK] RP : Yes , I think that 's it . Ok , we 'll see if he can give us any information . LC : Mhm . RP : So do you want to ask him or do you want me to ? I 'll do it . RP : I 'd like to find the rheumatology ward . [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RP : Ok , he told us to go to the building behind us , it 's the second door on the left . He 's giving us directions . That 's handy . There you go . [MASK] LC : Ok . LC : What time was our appointment ? [MASK] RP : So we have an appointment at 10.30 PM . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : It 's 10 PM just now so we have plenty of time . LC : Ok . RP : We have time . [MASK] LC : Ok . RP : Well that 's it , we 've arrived . LC : Ok . Very good . RP : Do you want to ask him ? LC : Ok . [end] LC : Um ... src: ARI : Hello , I 'm ARI the robot . Can I help you ? RC : Well , um , we 'd like to go to room 17 for an appointment . Where is ... Which way should we go to get to room 17 ? @ G ( LP+RC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) [start] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . RC : Oh , I think so . Room 17 ... LP : How could we ask him ? RC : It is room 17 that you 're showing us to ? ARI : Yes , you 're right . RC : So everything 's fine , we can go . He ca n't remember the doctor 's name either , can you help us please ? Will he ever move ? [MASK] [end] ARI : I 'm going to call a nurse to come and inform you . Do you have any other questions ? RC : We 'll wait for the nurse . ARI : Yes . ARI : Thank you , goodbye . RC : Goodbye .

LP : I know I have an appointment but I do n't know what time it 's at . How can I find out my appointment time ? @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RC : Well , firstly do you know where to find um which doctor it is , which department , which specialty . LP : Is there a reception ? @ G ( LP , go-to ( reception ) ) ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . LP : Um , how do I know what time my appointment is ? @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . LP : Um ... And ... And where is um ... Um , I , I remember , I think it 's room 17 . But I 'm not sure .
